info.name: RideSharing API Collection
info.description: Complete API collection for RideSharing platform including user management, trip management, fare calculation, driver operations, and real-time features

request.description: Login user and get JWT token

item.name: Fare Calculation

request.description: Calculate ride fare based on distance, duration, and other factors

item.description: Fare calculation and coupon management endpoints

request.description: Get active trips for a rider
Get active trips for a driver
Get trip history for a rider
Get trip history for a driver
Get driver's current location for a rider

item.name: Driver-Rider Matching

request.description: Update driver location for matching service
Update rider location for matching service
Get nearby available drivers for matching
Match rider with nearest available driver
Match rider with least busy driver
Match rider with highest rated driver

item.description: Driver-rider matching algorithms and location services

request.description: WebSocket endpoint for real-time location updates. Send to /app/location.update
WebSocket endpoint for driver status updates. Send to /app/driver.status
WebSocket endpoint to subscribe to trip updates. Send to /app/trip.subscribe
WebSocket endpoint to unsubscribe from trip updates. Send to /app/trip.unsubscribe
